title: Nickel polyelectrolytes as hole transporting materials for organic and perovskite solar cell applications
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00081A, Paper

Jin Hee Lee, Kausar Ali Khawaja, Faiza Shoukat, Yeasin Khan, Do Hui Kim, Shinuk Cho, Bright Walker, Jung Hwa Seo
Engineering interfacial materials for use between the active layer and the electrodes in organic and perovskite solar cells is one of the most effective ways to increase device efficiency.
